messages.subject: Re: Check out my dollies
messages.msgSnippet: The Okita one is adorable!  These look very different from all the other dolls I ve seen online. What a lucky find! And look, now Saitou doll! No fair :P
messages.messageBody:
The Okita one is adorable! These look very different from all the
other dolls I've seen online.

What a lucky find!

And look, now Saitou doll! No fair :P
